body.p: The Oxygen Publishing Engine can publish DITA topics to XHTML output and upload them directly as articles to Zendesk Help Center using the xhtml-zendesk transformation type.

The following parameters can be configured in the command line:
zendesk.host URL reference to the Zendesk Help Center, for example:https://your-domain.zendesk.com
zendesk.username Username for the account used to upload the content.
zendesk.token An API token generated in the Zendesk admin pages necessary for authentication to the server:
zendesk.category.name The name of the category in which the articles are uploaded. The category needs to be created in the Zendesk admin pages:
zendesk.section.name The name of the section (inside the parent category) in which articles are uploaded. The section needs to be reated in the Zendesk admin pages:
zendesk.create.drafts This setting controls if the articles should be published as draft articles.
zendesk.permission.group.name The name of the permission group under which the request to upload articles is made:
